reviewText: Gene Autry collection 11 has 4 of his early movies from the 30 tys they are all restored and uncut you will enjoy these classic Gene Autry movies .

Gene Autry may well be the original American Idol, his songs are a highlight in all of his movies. And Gene's movies are full of drama, action and even romance, not only with his horse Champion, but with various female leads as well. A really enjoyable extra is The Melody Ranch Theater where you get to see Gene and Pat Buttram reminisce, So this set, in fact, any or all of the other movie or TV collections, would be a good deal to have, once you start with one, you'll want to get them all, they will put you in a good mood everytime

The 4 films included in this set are all with Smiley Burnette as his sidekick.

Round-Up Time In Texas  1937 (Maxine Doyle)
Gene and Frog arrive with a herd of horses for Gene'e brother, a diamond prospector whose work has attracted the interest of a bunch of badguys

Guns And Guitars  1936 (Dorothy Dix)
After being framed for murdering the sheriff, Gene proves his innocence, then gets elected sheriff to go after the baddie who framed him.

Springtime In The Rockies 1937  (Polly Rowles,Ula Love)
Ranch owner Sandra, fresh from animal husbandry school, brings a flock of sheep into cattle country. The local ranchers don't like it, and ranch foreman Gene must deal with it.

The Singing Cowboy 1936  (Ann Gillis,Lon Chaney Jr.)
Gene heads for the big city to convince a coffee company to sponsor a radio broadcast so he can raise the money for an operation which will save a girl from being crippled for life.
I like all of Gene Autry movies.  I grew up with his shows.
Enjoyed all the movies on this disc....just need 2 more to complete my collection
A must for Gene Autry fans.
Another 4 Gene Autry Republic Pic adventures of side kicked by Smiley Burnette.  Well produced and fun to watch.  I recommend this DVD to Gene Autry fans.

Another 4 films from the Gene Autry archive, Naturally the quality varies overall due to their source but overall they are sharp in picture quality. If you want to get all Autry's musical cowboy films this fills another gap. A lot more to go yet.
You can't go wrong with Gene Autry!!!!!
All Gene Autry films are classic and this set is excellent, you must add it to your collection. John McHugh
ANOTHER GREAT SELECTION OF MORE GENE AUTRY WESTERNS. KEEP E'M COMING
